Polaris

Our design system helps us work together to build a great experience for all of Shopify’s merchants.

Check out these practical guides to help you understand how to design for the Shopify platform using Polaris.

What’s new

Polaris v9.0.0

A new approach to design tokens. Removes Sass functions, mixins, and more for new CSS custom properties and components to ensure you can ship design decisions with consistency and scale.

Read all Polaris updates

GraphQL API
